synopsis.text: Age of Gold's Epilogue: A Please Save My Earth Special Edition presents a blend of previously released OAV animation and fresh scenes adapted from the manga, unfolding events both preceding and succeeding the OAV storyline. This unique compilation also features six exclusive music videos showcasing never-before-seen footage and select manga scenes. As a bonus, viewers can enjoy an alternate version of the OAV's closing sequence and distinct end credits for the music videos, creating an immersive and engaging experience for fans of the series. (Source: Reinterpreted from provided synopses)
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
